name: Lost in Blue
description:
After a disastrous incident at sea, two young strangers are now stranded on a deserted island. In a journey of survival, adventure and mystery, they must work together to uncover the secrets of the island, learn to hunt and search for food, build tools and live long enough to escape.

  • Use the touch panel and microphone to hunt, pick up items, ignite a fire, build tools and more!
  • Unique Dual Phase System offers twice the gameplay - play as the hero or heroine
  • Activities such as fishing, hunting, trapping and cooking make living on the island fun
  • Multiple endings increase the excitement and mystery of escaping the island
